page.title: 12Industry in Pimperne.Taymix.
page.content: Mr D.W.Taylor,M.B.E.told us his family have lived in the area for over a hundred years.Originally it was a sheep farm but after the last war it was the biggest pig farm in Europe. Taymix,short for Taylor's Mix,came about after Mr Taylor had experimented with a special mixture of food for pigs in this area.His friends in other areas wanted him to do similar experiments for them.Mr Taylor now has two dairy herds with over a hundred cows,each herd controlled by one man. He also has 250 calves.He grows kaile, wheat,barley and grass.His transport business of about 40 lorries was started to carry pig food but now carries molasses and milk products and travels from Cornwall to Norfolk.
